meanings.definition: Modify or make according to individual or personal specifications.
meanings.sent1: She customises her phone case with stickers to make it unique.
meanings.sent2: The tailor customises the dress to fit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: He customises his lunchbox with superhero stickers for fun.
meanings.sent4: The artist customises the painting to reflect the client's personality.
meanings.sent5: Customising your workspace can boost creativity and productivity.

meanings.definition: Adapt or tailor to suit individual preferences.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant customises the dish to accommodate dietary restrictions.
meanings.sent2: She customises her schedule to include time for hobbies.
meanings.sent3: He customises his workout routine to match his fitness goals.
meanings.sent4: The company customises its services to meet customer needs.
meanings.sent5: Customising your approach can lead to better outcomes in negotiations.
